info.name: Peter
powers: Not very social around other dogs; Peter is lookign for a home as an only dog.

info.name: Sven
powers: Ideally going to a home with someone who has dog training

info.name: Jarrah
powers: Very loving nature, to both humans and other dogs
Ideally a home with other dogs, and someone with time for training

info.name: Angel
powers: Adores the company of people, and can't be left alone for more thana short while
Not very fond of other dogs, and does not like cats either

info.name: Tom
powers: Tom arrived with Lucy, they are looking for a home together and are inseparable.
Lucy is deaf and relies on Tom.

info.name: Lucy
powers: Lucy arrived with her friend Tom, they are looking for a home together and are inseparable
Lucy is deaf and relies on Tom.
